summary: {"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research', 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform', 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements', 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent', 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more', and 'Web Guide: An experimental AI-organized search results page'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new article 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?'","Added new article 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops'","Added new article 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini'","Added new article 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat'","Added new article 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research'","Added new article 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform'","Added new article 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements'","Added new article 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent'","Added new article 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more'","Added new article 'Web Guide: An experimental AI-organized search results page'"]}

{"what_changed":"Reorganization and renaming of certain sections, addition of new links and removal of old ones, changes in wording and structure for better clarity and user experience","change_type":"update/restructure","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Renaming of 'Plans for Copilot' to 'Plans'","Removal of 'Copilot features' and 'Best practices for using GitHub Copilot'","Addition of new links under 'How-tos' and 'Administer Copilot'","Changes in the 'Concepts' section, including the addition of 'About MCP'","Reorganization of 'Use Copilot agents' and 'Request a code review' under 'How-tos'"]}

{"what_changed":"Update of download and login links for Claude.ai","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Updated download link for Claude apps","Updated login link for Claude.ai"]}

{"what_changed":"The URL parameters for downloading the Claude app and logging in have changed.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Updated download URL from https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.e0360d15-f344-4083-ad78-29350c54037c/download to https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.d125650c-4414-41bc-834b-2158785bb504/download","Updated login URL from https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.e0360d15-f344-4083-ad78-29350c54037c to https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.d125650c-4414-41bc-834b-2158785bb504"]}

{"what_changed":"New article 'How Anthropic teams use Claude Code' was added to the news section","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Addition of a new case study article","Update to the news section with a new article dated Jul 24, 2025"]}

{"what_changed":"Changes in pricing plans, specifically in the 'Max' plan where usage is now described as 'per session', and the addition of 'Claude Code available separately through Anthropic Console' for Team and Enterprise plans.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Update in Max plan usage description","Addition of Claude Code availability for Team and Enterprise plans"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', and 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new article 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?'","Added new article 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops'","Added new article 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat'","Added new article 'Try on styles with AI, jump on great prices and more'"]}

{"what_changed":"Reorganization and updates of GitHub Copilot documentation","change_type":"update/restructure","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Reorganized 'Concepts' section","Updated 'How-tos' section with new links and reorganized content","Removed or renamed certain links and sections","Added new links for 'Coding agent', 'Code review', and 'Spaces'"]}

{"what_changed":"The download link for the Claude app has been updated with a new redirect URL.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Updated download link for Claude app from https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.f1d860cf-d18a-4694-bb3d-9d8f5920d73d/download to https://claude.ai/redirect/website.v1.e0360d15-f344-4083-ad78-29350c54037c/download","Example use case changed from 'build a bedtime story app' to 'debug a wedding website'"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research', 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform', 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements', 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent', 'Gemini Code Assist adds Gemini 2.5, personalization and context management', 'Listen to a conversation about the newest AI capabilities in Search', 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new articles under 'AI', 'Gemini App', 'Research', 'Developers', and 'All the Latest' sections","Updated Gemini Code Assist with new features","Introduced Gemini CLI as an open-source AI agent","Announced the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat","Published a podcast about the newest AI capabilities in Search"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and removal of old ones, update of featured news section","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of 'Thoughts on America’s AI Action Plan' article","Removal of 'Anthropic Economic Index: AI’s impact on software development' from featured section","Update of 'Introducing Claude 4' article"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos', and 'Startups can apply now for the Google for Startups Gemini Founders Forum'.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of new research article about FireSat","Update to Google Photos with new features","Introduction of Google for Startups Gemini Founders Forum"]}

{"what_changed":"Reorganization and updates of GitHub Copilot documentation, including changes to billing, concepts, and how-to sections","change_type":"update/restructure","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Updated billing section to include information on Spark billing","Added new concepts such as text completion and code referencing","Reorganized how-to sections for better clarity and added new topics such as using Copilot for common tasks and managing spending"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of GitHub Spark, update to pricing plans and addition of new models","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Introduction of GitHub Spark","Update to pricing plans, including the addition of a free tier and changes to the Pro and Pro+ plans","Addition of new models, including Claude Opus 4 and o3"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and updates to existing ones, including announcements, product updates, and policy changes","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["New partnership with the University of Chicago's Becker Friedman Institute on AI economic research","Introduction of Claude for Financial Services","Advancements in Claude for Education","Expansion of Claude for Enterprise use by Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory","Appointment of Paul Smith as Chief Commercial Officer","Introduction of the Anthropic Economic Futures Program"]}

{"what_changed":"Rephrased introduction to Perplexity Pro","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Changed 'Perplexity Pro is the most powerful way to search the internet' to 'Perplexity Pro unlocks more ways to learn and get work done'","Removed 'unlimited Pro Search' and 'collaborative spaces' from the introduction","Added 'unlimited Research' to the introduction"]}

{"what_changed":"The OpenAI pricing page has been updated with new features, models, and pricing plans.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["New features added to each plan, including access to GPT-4.5 research preview and OpenAI o3-pro","Changes to the pricing plans, including the introduction of a new 'Pro' plan","Updates to the 'Team' and 'Enterprise' plans, including new features and security controls"]}
{"what_changed":"Addition of 'Voice' feature","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Introduction of a 'Voice' option in the chat interface"]}
{"what_changed":"Removal of the 'Voice' feature","change_type":"removal","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["The 'Voice' button has been removed from the interface"]}

{"what_changed":"The content has changed from a security verification page to the OpenAI homepage, featuring various products, research, and company information.","change_type":"update","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of new products and features such as ChatGPT, Sora, and API Platform","Addition of research and company information sections","Removal of security verification page content","Update of the overall layout and design"]}

{"what_changed":"The content has changed from a security verification page to a ChatGPT interface","change_type":"update","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Removal of security verification content","Introduction of ChatGPT interface","Addition of login and sign-up options","Inclusion of terms and privacy policy links"]}

{"what_changed":"Removal of 'Set extension permissions' under 'Administer' and 'Manage for organization' sections, and addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' under 'Concepts' section","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Removal of 'Set extension permissions' link","Addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' link"]}

{"what_changed":"New article 'Build AI in America' added, and 'No results found' message removed","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Added new article 'Build AI in America' on Jul 21, 2025","Removed 'No results found' message from news section"]}
